title: For a holiday that honestly doesn't mean much, NYE has a shitty way of making you feel miserable
body:
It makes you think of the entire year and how lonely you've been and then how extra alone you are on that last day.

Sorry for dragging anyone who reads this down. I just needed somewhere to vent my thoughts and this seemed the only place that maybe someone sees it, even if that doesn't actually do much.

Here's to wishing fortune cookies actually came true.
